thread.title_full: Brenda Lin found out her family was murdered on Facebook | Daily Mail Online

author: Nic White For Daily Mail Australia
title: Brenda Lin found out her family was murdered on Facebook | Daily Mail Online
text: 'It was such a surreal sort of feeling': Brenda Lin reveals she learned of her family's brutal murder from Facebook when a friend shared a news article that included a picture of her home Robert Xie brutally murdered five members of his family with a hammer in 2011 The only survivor Brenda, 15, was overseas on a school trip at the time She found out when a friend sent her a link on Facebook showing her house For the next two years she lived with Xie not knowing her was the killer Ms Lin accused him of repeatedly raping her during that time She will tell her story in an interview with Sunday night on February 26 Published: 01:18 GMT, 25 February 2017 | Updated: 02:41 GMT, 25 February 2017 531 shares
